subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|宀|人|茻|ls=ic|t1=house|t2=person|t3=grass}} – a person in a house, sleeping in the grass to protect from the cold. In some bronze inscriptions, {{zh-l|*二}} is added at the bottom of the character; this may simply be decorative or may represent a mat. In the seal script, {{zh-l|*二}} is changed to {{zh-l|*仌|ice}} to emphasize its meaning of coldness.
